io.openhc.ohc

Class OHC

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.openhc.ohc.OHC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broadcaster.Broadcast_receiver

    public class OHC
extends java.lang.Object
implements Broadcaster.Broadcast_receiver
    Main control class, contains initialization and ui page change logic
    Author:
    Tobias Schramm
